Detailed Description

Common functions shared between modules.

Author:
Richard Hughes <richard@hughsie.com>
Date:
2005-10-02

Definition in file gpm-common.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum PowerDevice
 

The device type of the cached object.

Enumerator:
POWER_NONE  The blank device.
POWER_UNKNOWN  An unknown device.
POWER_AC_ADAPTER  An AC Adapter.
POWER_PRIMARY_BATTERY  A laptop battery.
POWER_UPS  An Uninterruptible Power Supply.
POWER_MOUSE  A wireless, battery mouse.
POWER_KEYBOARD  A wireless, battery keyboard.
POWER_PDA  A Personal Digital Assistant.

void create_virtual_of_type (  GPtrArray *  objectData,
GenericObject *  slotDataReturn,
gint  powerDevice
) 
 

Returns a virtual device that takes into account having more than one device that needs to be averaged.

Note:
Currently we are calculating percentageCharge and minutesRemaining only.
Parameters:
objectData the device database
slotDataReturn the object returned. Must not be NULL
powerDevice the object to be returned. Usually POWER_PRIMARY_BATTERY
